GR14mdhvkmou:2_0: arcitaḥ saṃsmṛto dhyātaḥ kīrtitaḥ kathitaḥ śrutaḥ yo dadāty amṛtatvaṃ hi sa māṃ rakṣatu
GR14mdhvkmou:2_1: keśavaḥ. tāpatrayeṇa saṃtaptaṃ yad etad akhilaṃ jagat vakṣyāmi śāntaye hy asya kṛṣṇāmṛtamahārṇavam.
GR14mdhvkmou:2_2: te narāḥ paśavo loke kiṃ teṣāṃ jīvane phalam yair na labdhā harer dīkṣā nārcito vā
GR14mdhvkmou:2_3: janārdanaḥ. saṃsāre 'smin mahāghore janmarogabhayākule ayam eko mahābhāgaḥ pūjyate
GR14mdhvkmou:2_4: yad adhokṣajaḥ. sa nāma sukṛtī loke kulaṃ tena hy alaṃkṛtam ādhāraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:2_5: yena viṣṇuḥ prasāditaḥ. yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva śubhānāṃ caiva karmaṇāṃ tadviśiṣṭaphalaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:2_6: nṛṇāṃ sadaivārādhanaṃ hareḥ. kalau kalimaladhvaṃsisarvapāpaharaṃ harim ye 'rcayanti
GR14mdhvkmou:2_7: narā nityaṃ te 'pi vandyā yathā hariḥ. nāsti śreyaskaraṃ nṛṇāṃ viṣṇor ārādhanān mune
GR14mdhvkmou:2_8: yuge 'smiṃs tāmase loke satataṃ pūjyate nṛbhiḥ. arcite sarvadeveśe śaṅkacakragadādhare
GR14mdhvkmou:2_9: arcitāḥ sarvadevāḥ syur yataḥ sarvagato hariḥ. // MKm_9
GR14mdhvkmou:3: svarcite sarvalokeśe surāsuranamaskṛte keśave kaṃsakeśighne na yāti narakaṃ naraḥ. // MKm_10
GR14mdhvkmou:4_0: sakṛd abhyarcya govindaṃ bilvapatreṇa mānavaḥ muktibhāgī nirātaṅkī viṣṇuloke ciraṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:4_1: vaset. sakṛd abhyarcito yena heḷayā 'pi namaskṛtaḥ sa yāti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat surair
GR14mdhvkmou:5: samastalokanāthasya devadevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ sākṣād bhagavato viṣṇoḥ pūjanaṃ janmanaḥ phalam. Pulastyaḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:6_0: bhaktyā dūrvāṅkuraiḥ pumbhiḥ pūjitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ harir dadāti hi phalaṃ sarvayajñaiś
GR14mdhvkmou:6_1: ca durlabham. vidhinā devadeveśaḥ śaṅkhacakradharo hariḥ phalaṃ dadāti sulabhaṃ salilenāpi
GR14mdhvkmou:7: narake pacyamānas tu yamena paribhāṣitaḥ kiṃ tvayā nārcito devaḥ keśavaḥ kleśanāśanaḥ. // Dharmaḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:8_0: narasiṃho hṛṣīkeśaḥ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇaḥ smaraṇān muktido nṛṇāṃ sa tvayā kiṃ na pūjitaḥ. //
GR14mdhvkmou:8_1: dravyāṇām apy abhāve tu salilenāpi pūjitaḥ yo dadāti svakaṃ sthānaṃ sa tvayā kiṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:8_2: na pūjitaḥ. garbhasthitāmṛtā vā 'pi muṣitāste sudūṣitāḥ na prāptā yair harer dīkṣā
GR14mdhvkmou:9_0: sakṛd abhyarcito yena devadevo janārdanaḥ yat kṛtaṃ tatkṛtaṃ tena samprāptaṃ paramaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:9_1: padam. dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ nānyopāyas tu vidyate satyaṃ bravīmi deveśa hṛṣīkeśārcanāhate. //
GR14mdhvkmou:10: tasya yajñavarāhasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ praṇāmaṃ ye 'pi kurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ. // Marīciḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:11: anārādhitagovindair naraiḥ sthānaṃ nṛpātmaja na hi samprāpyate śreṣṭhaṃ tasmād ārādhayācyutam. Atriḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:12: paraḥ parāṇāṃ puruṣas tuṣṭo yasya janārdanaḥ sa cā 'pnoty akṣayaṃ sthānam etat satyaṃ mayoditam. Aṅgirāḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:13: yasyāntaḥ sarvam evedam acyutasyākhyayātmanaḥ tam ārādhaya govindaṃ sthānam agryaṃ yadīcchasi. Pulahaḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:14_0: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma yo 'sau brahma sanātanam tam ārādhya hariṃ yāti muktim apy
GR14mdhvkmou:14_1: atidurlabhām. aindram indraḥ paraṃ sthānaṃ yam ārādhya jagatpatim prāpa yajñapatiṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:14_2: viṣṇuṃ tam ārādhaya suvrata. prāpnoty ārādhite viṣṇau manasā yad yad icchati trailokyāntargataṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:14_3: sthānaṃ kimu lokottarottarān. ye smaranti sadā viṣṇuṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam sarvapāpavinirmuktāḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:14_4: paraṃ brahma viśanti te. tato 'niruddhaṃ deveśaṃ pradyumnaṃ ca tataḥ param tataḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:14_5: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devaṃ vāsudevaṃ parāt param. // MKm_30 //
GR14mdhvkmou:15: vāsudevāt paraṃ nāsti iti vedāntaniścayaḥ vāsudevaṃ praviṣṭānāṃ punar āvartanaṃ kutaḥ. // Ātreyaḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:16: yo yān icchen naraḥ kāmān nārī vā varavarṇinī tān samāpnoti vipulān samārādhya janārdhanam. Pulaha sagte:
GR14mdhvkmou:18: bāhubhyāṃ sāgaraṃ tartuṃ ka iccheta pumān bhuvi vāsudevam anārādhya ko mokṣaṃ gantum icchati. Śaṃkaraḥ:
GR14mdhvkmou:19_0: kṛte pāpe 'nutāpo vai yasya puṃsaḥ prajāyate prāyaścittaṃ tu tasyoktaṃ harisaṃsmaraṇaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:19_1: param. na hy apuṇyavatāṃ loke mūḍhānāṃ kuṭilātmanāṃ bhaktir bhavati govinde smaraṇaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:19_2: kīrtanaṃ tathā. tadaiva puruṣo mukto janmaduḥkhajarādibhiḥ jitendriyo viśuddhātmā
GR14mdhvkmou:19_3: yadaiva smarate harim. // prāpte kaliyuge ghore dharmajñānavivarjite na kaścit smarate
GR14mdhvkmou:19_4: devaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kalimalāpaham. // na kalau devadevasya janmaduḥkhāpahāriṇaḥ karoti martyo
GR14mdhvkmou:19_5: mūḍhātmā smaraṇaṃ kīrtanaṃ hareḥ. ye smaranti sadā viṣṇuṃ viśuddhenāntarātmanā te
GR14mdhvkmou:19_6: prayānti bhavaṃ tyaktvā viṣṇulokam anāmayam. garbhajanmajarārogaduḥkha saṃsārabandhanaiḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:19_7: na bādhyate naro nityaṃ vāsudevam anusmaran. // yamamārgāṃ mahāghoraṃ narakāṇi yamaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:19_8: tathā svapne 'pi ca na paśyeta yaḥ smared garuḍadhvajam. hṛdi rūpaṃ mukhe nāma naivedyam
GR14mdhvkmou:19_9: udare hareḥ pādodakaṃ ca nirmālyaṃ mastake yasya so 'cyutaḥ. govindasmaraṇaṃ puṃsāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:19_10: pāparāśimahācalam asaṃśayaṃ dahaty āśu tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ. // MKm_43
GR14mdhvkmou:21: smaraṇād eva kṛṣṇasya pāpasaṅghātapañjaram śatadhā bhedam āyāti girir vajrahato tathā. // kṛṣṇe ratāḥ kṛṣṇam anusmarantaḥ tad bhāvitās tad gatamānasāś ca.
GR14mdhvkmou:22: te bhinnadehāḥ praviśanti viṣṇuṃ havir yathā mantrahutaṃ hutāśe. // MKm_45
GR14mdhvkmou:23_0: sā hānis tan mahat chidraṃ sā cāndhajaḍamūkatā yan muhūrtaṃ kṣaṇaṃ vā 'pi vāsudevo
GR14mdhvkmou:23_1: na cintyate. nārāyaṇo nāma naro narāṇāṃ prasaṃhya coraḥ kathitaḥ pṛthivyām anekajanmārjitapāpasañcayaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:24_0: yasya saṃsmaraṇād eva vāsudevasya śārṅgiṇaḥ koṭijanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ takṣaṇād eva naśyati. //
GR14mdhvkmou:24_1: kiṃ tasya bahubhis tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ yo nityaṃ dhyāyate devaṃ nārāyaṇam
GR14mdhvkmou:25: ye mānavā vigatarāgaparāvarajñā nārāyaṇaṃ suraguruṃ satataṃ smaranti dhyānena tena hatakilbiṣacetanāste mātuḥ payodhararasaṃ na punaḥ pibanti.
GR14mdhvkmou:26_0: he citta cintaya sveha vāsudevam aharniśam nūnaṃ yaś cintitaḥ puṃsāṃ hanti saṃsārabandhanam.
GR14mdhvkmou:26_1: āloḍya sarvaśāstrāṇi vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ idam ekaṃ suniṣpannaṃ dhyeyo nārāyaṇaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:26_2: sadā. // smṛte sakalakalyāṇabhājanaṃ yatra jāyate puruṣas tam ajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi
GR14mdhvkmou:26_3: śaraṇaṃ harim. // vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapasu caiva dāneṣu tīrtheṣu vrateṣu caiva iṣṭeṣu
GR14mdhvkmou:26_4: pūrteṣu ca yat pradiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ smṛte tat khalu vāsudeve. // MKm_54
GR14mdhvkmou:28: ārādhayaiva naro viṣṇuṃ manaso yad yad icchati phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ bhūri svalpam athāpi vā. // MKm_55 //
GR14mdhvkmou:29_0: yan nāmakīrtanaṃ bhaktyā vilāyanam anuttamam maitreyāśeṣapāpānāṃ dhātūnām iva pāvakaḥ. //
GR14mdhvkmou:29_1: kalikalmaṣam atyugraṃ narakārtipradaṃ nṛṇām prayāti vilayaṃ sadyaḥ sakṛt saṃkīrtite
GR14mdhvkmou:31_0: catussāgaram āsādya jambūdvīpottame kvacit na pumān keśavād anyaḥ sarvapāpacikitsakaḥ. //
GR14mdhvkmou:31_1: yad abhyarcya hariṃ bhaktyā kṛte varṣaśatair api phalaṃ prāpnoty avikalaṃ kalau saṃkīrtya
GR14mdhvkmou:32_0: kṣīyate tu yadā dharmaḥ prāpte ghore kalau yuge tadā na kīrtayet kaścin muktidaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:32_1: devam acyutam. avaśenāpi yannāmni kīrtite sarvapātakaiḥ pumān vimucyate sadyaḥ siṃhatrastamṛgair
GR14mdhvkmou:32_2: iva. // nārāyaṇeti mantro 'sti vāg asti vaśavartinī
GR14mdhvkmou:33: tathā 'pi narake ghore majjantīty etad adbhutam. // MKm_63 //
GR14mdhvkmou:34: ārtā viṣaṇṇāḥ śithilāś ca bhītā ghoreṣu ca vyādhiṣu vartamānāḥ saṃkīrtya nārāyaṅaśabdamātraṃ vimuktaduḥkhāḥ sukhino bhavanti. // MKm_64
GR14mdhvkmou:36_0: sakṛd uccāritaṃ yais tu kṛṣṇeti na viśanti te garbhāgāraṃ gṛhaṃ mātur yamalokaṃ ca
GR14mdhvkmou:36_1: dussaham. kva nākapṛṣṭhagamanaṃ punarāvṛttilakṣaṇam kva japo vāsudeveti muktibījam
GR14mdhvkmou:37_0: buddhyā buddhvā vadasvainaṃ harir ity akṣaradvayam smaraṇād eva kṛṣṇasya na punarjāyate
GR14mdhvkmou:37_1: kvacit. he jihve mama nisnehe hariṃ kiṃ nuna bhāṣase hariṃ vadasva kalyāṇi saṃsārodadhinaur
GR14mdhvkmou:37_2: hariḥ. asāre khalu saṃsāre sārāt sārataro hariḥ puṇyahīnā na vindanti sāraṅgāś ca
GR14mdhvkmou:37_3: yathā jalam. // kurukṣetreṇa kiṃ tasya kiṃ kāśyā puṣkareṇa vā jihvāgre vartate tasya
GR14mdhvkmou:38: asāre khalu saṃsāre sāram ekaṃ nirūpitam samastalokanāthasya sāram ārādhanaṃ hareḥ. // MKm_71
GR14mdhvkmou:39: sā jihvā yā hariṃ stauti tac cittaṃ yat tadarpaṇam tāv eva kevalau ślāghyau yau tatpūjākarau karau. // MKm_72 //
GR14mdhvkmou:40: yas tu viṣṇuparo nityaṃ dṛḍhabhaktir jitendriyaḥ svagṛhe 'pi vasan yāti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam. // MKm_73 //
GR14mdhvkmou:42_0: sādhu sādhu mahābhāga sādhu dānavanāśan yan māṃ pṛcchasi dharmajña keśavārādhanaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:42_1: prati. // nimiṣaṃ nimiṣārdhaṃ vā muhūrtam api bhārgava nādagdhāśeṣapāpānāṃ bhakti
GR14mdhvkmou:42_2: bhavati keśave. // kiṃ tena manasā kāryaṃ yan na tiṣṭhati keśave mano muktiphalāvāptyau
GR14mdhvkmou:42_3: kāraṇaṃ saprayojanam. rogo nāma na sā jihvā yayā na stūyate hariḥ gartau nāma na
GR14mdhvkmou:42_4: tau karṇau yābhyāṃ tat karma na śrutam. // MKm_77 //
GR14mdhvkmou:43_0: nūnaṃ tat kaṇṭhaśālūkam athavā 'py upajihvikā rogo nāma na sā jihvā yā na vakti harer
GR14mdhvkmou:43_1: guṇān. bhārabhūtaiḥ kāryam ebhiḥ kiṃ tasya nṛpaśor dvija caraṇau tau tu saphalau
GR14mdhvkmou:43_2: keśavālayagāminau te ca netre mahābhāga yābhyāṃ sandṛśyate hariḥ. // MKm_79 //
GR14mdhvkmou:44_0: kiṃ tasya caraṇaiḥ kāryaṃ vṛthāsañcaraṇair dvija yair hi na vrajate jantuḥ keśavālayadarśane.
GR14mdhvkmou:44_1: vedavedāṅgaviduṣāṃ munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām ṛṣitvam api dharmajña vijñeyaṃ tatprasādajam. //
GR14mdhvkmou:44_2: vicitraratnaparyaṅke mahābhogena bhoginaḥ ramante nākanārībhiḥ keśavasmaraṇāt phalam. //
GR14mdhvkmou:45_0: aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ yaḥ sahasraṃ samācaret nāsau tat phalam āpnoti tadbhaktair yad
GR14mdhvkmou:45_1: avāpyate. re re manuṣyāḥ puruṣottamasya karau na kasmān mukulīkurudhve kriyājuṣāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:45_2: ko bhavatāṃ prayāsaḥ phalaṃ hi yat padam acyutasya. // MKm_84
GR14mdhvkmou:46_0: viṣṇor vimānaṃ yaḥ kuryāt sakṛd bhaktyā pradakṣiṇam aśvamedhasahasrasya phalam āpnoti
GR14mdhvkmou:46_1: mānavaḥ. pradakṣiṇaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād haribhaktyā samanvitaḥ haṃsayuktivimānena viṣṇulokaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:46_2: sa gacchati. tīrthakoṭisahasrāṇi vratakoṭiśatāni ca nārāyaṇapraṇāmasya kalāṃ nārhanti
GR14mdhvkmou:47_0: urasā śirasā dṛṣṭyā manasā vacasā tathā padbhyāṃ karābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ praṇāmo 'ṣṭāṅga
GR14mdhvkmou:47_1: īritaḥ. śāṭhyenāpi namaskāraṃ kurvataḥ śārṅgapāṇaye śātajanmārjitaṃ pāpaṃ naśyaty
GR14mdhvkmou:47_2: eva na saṃśayaḥ. saṃsārārṇavam agrānāṃ narāṇāṃ pāpakarmaṇām nānyo dharttā jagannāthaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:47_3: muktvā nārāyaṇaṃ param. reṇukuṇṭhigātrasya kaṇā yāvanti bhārata tāvad varṣasahasrāṇi
GR14mdhvkmou:48: pāvanaṃ viṣṇunaivedyaṃ subhojyam ṛṣibhiḥ smṛtam anyadevasya naivedyaṃ bhuktvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret. // MKm_92 //
GR14mdhvkmou:49_0: koṭyaindavasahasrais tu māsopoṣaṇakoṭibhiḥ yat phalaṃ labhyate pumbhir viṣṇor naivedya
GR14mdhvkmou:49_1: bhakṣaṇāt. trirātraphaladā nadyo yāḥ kāścid asamudragāḥ samudragās tu pakṣasya māsasya
GR14mdhvkmou:49_2: saritāṃ patiḥ. ṣaṇmāsaphaladā godā vatsarasya tu jāhnavī viṣṇupādodakasyaite kalāṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:50: gaṇgāprayāgagayapuṣkaranaimiśāni saṃsevitāni bahuśaḥ kurujāṅgalāni kālena tīrthasalilāni punanti pāpaṃ pādodakaṃ bhagavataḥ prapunāti sadyaḥ.
GR14mdhvkmou:51_0: yāni kāni ca tīrthāni brahmāṇḍāntargatāni vai viṣṇupādodakasyaite kalāṃ nārhanti
GR14mdhvkmou:51_1: ṣoḍaśīm. snānaṃ pādodakaṃ viṣṇoḥ piban śirasi dhārayan sarva pāpavinirmukto vaiṣṇavīṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:51_2: siddhim āpnuyāt. yathā pādodakaṃ puṇyaṃ nirmālyaṃ cānulepanam naivedyaṃ dhūpaśeṣaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:51_3: ca ārārttiś ca tathā hareḥ. tulasyās tu rajojuṣṭaṃ naivedyasya ca bhakṣaṇam nirmālyaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:51_4: śirasā dhāryaṃ mahāpātakanāśanam. bhaktyā vā yadi vā 'bhaktyā cakrāṅkitaśilām prati
GR14mdhvkmou:51_5: darśanaṃ sparśanaṃ vā 'pi sarvapāpapraṇāśanam. sāḷagrāmodbhavo devo devo dvāravatībhavaḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:53: yojanāni tathā trīṇi mama kṣetraṃ vasundhare. // MKm_103 //
GR14mdhvkmou:54_0: śālagrāmodbhavo devo śailaṃ cakrāṅkamaṇḍitam yatrāpi nīyate tatra vāraṇasyā śatādhikam. //
GR14mdhvkmou:54_1: sāḷagrāmodbhavo devo devo dvāravatībhavaḥ ubhayoḥ saṃgamo yatra tatra muktir na saṃśayaḥ.
GR14mdhvkmou:54_2: hariṇā muktidānīha muktisthānāni sarvaśaḥ sa yasya sarvabhāveṣu tasya taiḥ kiṃ prayojanam.
GR14mdhvkmou:54_3: harir yāti harir yāti dasyuvyājena yo vadet so 'pi sadgatim āpnoti gatiṃ sukṛtino
GR14mdhvkmou:54_4: yathā. // vāsudevaṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate tyaktvā 'mṛtaṃ sa mūḍhātmā
GR14mdhvkmou:55_0: tyaktvāmṛtaṃ yathā kaścid anyapānaṃ piben naraḥ tathā hariṃ parityajya cānyaṃ devam
GR14mdhvkmou:55_1: upāsate. svadharmaṃ tu parityajya paradharmaṃ yathā caret tathā hariṃ parityajya
GR14mdhvkmou:55_2: cānyaṃ devam upāsate. gāṃ ca tyaktvā vimūḍhātmā gardabhīṃ vandate yathā tathā hariṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:55_3: parityajya cānyaṃ devam upāsate. vāsudevaṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate tṛṣito
GR14mdhvkmou:55_4: jāhnavītīre kūpaṃ khanati durmatiḥ. yathā gaṅgodakaṃ tyaktvā pibet kūpodakaṃ naraḥ
GR14mdhvkmou:55_5: tathā hariṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate. svamātaraṃ parityajya śvapākīṃ vandate
GR14mdhvkmou:55_6: tathā tathā hariṃ parityajya yo 'nyaṃ devam upāsate. yāvat svastham idaṃ piṇḍaṃ nirujaṃ
GR14mdhvkmou:55_7: karaṇānvitam tāvat kuruṣvā 'tmahitaṃ paścāt tāpena tapyase. yāvat svāsthyaṃ śarīreṣu
